titleStmt.title: Codes for the representation of names of scripts

spec.scope: Codes for the representation of script names

info.p: "ISO 15924:2004 provides a code for the presentation of names of scripts. The codes were devised for use in terminology, lexicography, bibliography and linguistics, but they may be used for any application requiring the expression of scripts in coded form. ISO 15924:2004 also includes guidance on the use of script codes in some of these applications." Abstract, ISO 15924:2004
